name: SigmaGrid
description: SigmaGrid provides paid, institutional-grade fundamentals and regime context for synthetic-equity perpetual markets.

capabilities.description: Point-in-time fundamentals snapshot for synthetic equity perps.
Macro and market regime classification for equity-linked instruments.
Macro factor sensitivities including beta_macro, beta_yield, beta_dollar, and beta_vol_index.
Fair-value and anchor context for synthetic equity markets.

payments.notes: Endpoints may return HTTP 402 with payment instructions.
